title: Please help me Riot games
body:
Alright,I just got project zed,can you please give me 2 orange essence to craft it? Thanks.
Here it is:
https://scontent-vie1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t35.0-12/15934131_669350763235777_2044198516_o.png?oh=492359eaede1ab0d237a68539bfa011e&oe=58730039

replies.body: Ahh, you're so close!  We can't gift essences but you don't need to spend RP either.  Per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) you can still earn a mastery chest by getting your first S with a champion you own.  You'll have a chance of finding some essences or disenchants there.  Good luck!
